scripts.publish: npm run prerelease && npm run build:prod && ./node_modules/.bin/lerna publish --force-publish --access public --exact -m "chore(@multiversx) publish %s release"
scripts.publish:beta: npm run prerelease && npm run build:prod && ./node_modules/.bin/lerna publish --npm-tag=beta --access public -m "chore(@multiversx) publish %s release"
scripts.publish:next: npm run prerelease && npm run build:prod && ./node_modules/.bin/lerna publish --npm-tag=next --access public --skip-git -m "chore(@multiversx) publish %s release"
scripts.publish:rc: npm run prerelease && npm run build:prod && ./node_modules/.bin/lerna publish --npm-tag=rc --access public -m "chore(@multiversx) publish %s release"
scripts.publish:test: npm run prerelease && npm run build:prod && ./node_modules/.bin/lerna publish --force-publish --access public --npm-tag=test --skip-git -m "chore(@multiversx) publish %s release"
